title: How to Add Album Art on Android

steps.title: Install Album Art Grabber from the Play Store.
steps.content: Install Album Art Grabber from the Play Store. It’s a free app that scans music websites for album artwork. To install the app, open the Play Store (the multicolored triangle icon in the app drawer), then search for album art grabber . When you located the app, tap INSTALL .

steps.title: Open Album Art Grabber.
steps.content: Open Album Art Grabber. It’s the gray record icon in the app drawer. Depending on your settings, you may also find it on your home screen.

steps.title: Tap a song or album.
steps.content: Tap a song or album. This opens the “Choose image from” window.

steps.title: Select a source.
steps.content: Select a source. Album Art Grabber can grab album art from LastFM , MusicBrainz , or your SD card . Once selected, a window containing matching results will appear.

steps.title: Tap the album art you want to use.
steps.content: Tap the album art you want to use. A confirmation window will appear.

steps.title: Tap Set.
steps.content: Tap Set . The album art is now connected to the selected song or album.
